data.name: Aquarist Demo
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to Aquarist! The water adventure begin right now!
Let's start with the demo - this is where you will build your first aquarium. We have provided everything you will need. However, in the full version of the game, you will have to face more difficult modes and challenges to choose from. if you would like to learn more about them, add the game to your Steam wishlist.
Have fun!
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Run the best aquarium shop in town! Create, renew, manage, observe. See if you can create an aquarium empire.

fullgame.name: Aquarist - build aquariums, grow fish, develop your business!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 750
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
